values:
Hahahahahaha.
"When I say let's keep in touch
I really mean you should grow up" Heh, When are you going to learn that none of that shit really matters? You used to be so free. And now that you play pretend it just disgusts.

I said fuck iiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiit!!!!!!!!

Right? So so far in this shit I can't quite get out of this fucking hole I seemed to dig for myself. And now that I am half way through and on the way down I see it is too late for that. And now the hole is so fucking immense that I just can't quite get up the steep sides. Could someone just get a goddamned shovel and bury me?

So we swim and we swim, right? And we fight to stay afloat. But we never get what we truly want because we get so wrapped up in all of this spoonfed braindead bullshit. Media tells you what you should be sweatin and what don't really matter. And no one really sells out, Shit ask them, They just buy in. Earn yourself a small spot in the land of the dead where you can finally get some real peace and quiet. You know what the fuck I am talking about. Don't play stupid and with me of all people. They call em cemetaries. You work all that time and get all this shit accumulated and for what? For what. I'll tell you what. So while you live you can feel like the man or the queen B. Heh. And none of it goes back with you when you return what was never really yours (rented, at best) back to the mother. That's right, THE MOTHER. And what? We got ourselves a religious war going yet? A regular Crusade and shit. That is another thing we seem to have gotten all out of order. This beast they call religion. An organization. A real moneymaker that one there. You see I myself am a very spiritual being and believe what feels in my being to be what's real. Not what everyone says is the real way to feel and "worship" And all that crazed ferver. What it is is what it always will be, you know. Matter is all that does. Not what you think should matter. If at all there is one particle of mattering to it it is and always never will be. You still there? Haven't written me off as some crazy fool who knows not the way of it? You just gotta think about it for a few of those precious moments you covet and grasp to like there isn't anything else. There is always something else. Energy is displaced (it changes shape, form, chemical makeup and all kinds of other neat stuff), it is sent from here to there and back again. But it does not ever truly die. And all these gods of yours and his and hers and theirs? Well you already know what it be. They are all truly one. Masqueraded about under many different guises and danced about beneath many other names. But one in the same it is. The highest power is but a thought from your mind and you can create the most wondrous things. As long as your mind sees it it is. You still with me here? Now what I mean to say is when you daydream is the thought and mental pictures drawn not enough supporting evidence that in some reality these things have become real? That they now exist? Just think on it for a time. Then you tell me what you think of all this bullshit. Right right? What what and Goodday. Godspeed you in all things. Haha (take nothing I say to be a mockery of anything.)

What? Something wrong? Yeah. Something is always going all fucking crazy and shit.

I don't even know what the fuck I was going to say.

So yeah. I have been preparing myself for service. Military type shit I mean. Damn I just get this feeling that things are going to get fucked up real soon. And this is the best thing that I can come up with to circumvent the coming storm. My father is going to kick me out in a week if I don't get a job over his dog shitting constantly on the floor. Simply put, It is fucking disgusting there. No one cleans up after themselves. And he (good ole dad I mean) thinks I am still a child that he can make slave away for him or some shit. 

I will give you that back story before I confuse you or something. Alright, here we go. He has always been a fucking asshole. Used to deal with me much like he would deal with some motherfucker off of the street. I deserve a whipping, aparently I deserved a lot back then and was much too small to fight back. And I hauled ass when I turned sixteen. Gone for five years. Saw him and the rest of those fucks two, maybe three times in that whole time. 

Then some unfortunate things happened, I did some real stupid shit and ended up as a last resort having to take his help again. Well, as it turns out he is stuck seven years in the past thinking I am still a boy of fourteen or so and still his slave. The motherfucker is the epitome of lazy. Used to make me do everything he didn't want to do. Used to steal my birthday money and use it for his cocaine habits. You know the usual shit a kid should never have to deal with.

Except this time I am twenty-one and he can't put a hand on me without having his face smashed through the back of his head. I have been waiting for him to step up for so long now it aches in me. 

And now I will bring you up to present time. Now he thinks that he has his little slave back as I have said before. But I feel like fuck that. Though grateful for the roof over my head and such things I refuse to be treated the way that he thinks he has the right to treat me. No one should have to endure these things. well last night I got home late after spending the day JOB HUNTING all fucking day to find that my older brother had not taken the dog out at all. As you can imagine it was fucking nasty. He dropped several yuk bombs all over the house. Hmmmm. So what do I do. I go outside and sit thinking the whole while how fucked up it is that if I don't walk the dog he doesn't go out. And if he shits on the floor if I don't pick it up it just fucking sits and stinks. Well this to me is incredibly fucking sickening to the point where I really don't want to live with those fucks anymore anyway. But back to what happened last night. Now normally I would jump right on it and clean shit up off of the floor. It is to me an unliveable condition to have any type of feces just sitting around. But this night I had a point to make. And I'll be damned if it were not made. 
Anywhichwhat the motherfucker comes home from work (my "dad" i mean) and sees all the shit. Now he doesn't say shit to anyone else woh happened to be at home all fucking day about it. Not my little sisters and not my older brother. Straight to the room, opens the door and looks right at me, "Damn Raymond, you been home for a little while now and you aint cleaned up the shit?" Now something else you should know is it is his dog. He made that shit abundantly clear when he got it. I say no. I tell him that it happened before I got home And I was tired of motherfuckers deferring straight to me with this type of bullshit. Well he pretty much slams the door in my face and walks away for a few moments. Then he comes back and says that I have a week before he is going to put me out on the street. Haha. Then I said "That is fine, I really don't care." For you see I have come to expect this kind of nonsense from a man who would steal his own twelve year olds birthday money for a gram of that white stuff. From a man who would beat his own son like some man off the street as if he didn't matter to him at all. 

Hell I knew it was a bad idea to move back in in the first place. But we all slip and fall sometimes and need help back up every now and again. But I was misinformed by some of the other in the family. Untruly told that he was a changed man and that everyone deserves a second chance. Haha. 

Damn that feels much better. A load off of my shoulders. But I am still needing to tell him about himself one day soon.

Eff yes I still use this. Why not? Because it is fashionable to just move on, over and out, good while it lasted and goodbye. Nah, still stuck here and now. Ahhhh man I been slackin for so goddamn long it aint even funny no more. But I am here standing solid, resolve just as strong as the day I was fucking born. Know what I mean? OUTRAGED AT THIS BULLSHIT. YOU THINK YOU'RE FREE? HA. AND WHEN YOU REALIZE THAT THE REVOLUTIONS ARE DEAD AND THEY GOT YOU RIGHT WHERE THEY WANT IT YOU WILL BE BETTER OFF

Just got out of jail. That is a relief. Saw a guy named Chris C. downtown the day I got out. It was fun. Said I should come to where he works and he would buy me a beer. Think in the next week I will hit him up on that offer. But it will have to be after I start work, which should be in the next day or two. Got to get on the ball about that stuff. You know how the state iss about money owed to them. That is what I got violated for the first time. 

Next time they will be looking to give me that six months suspended sentence looming over my head. Like the pilot with the atom      waiting, poised to strike upon the orders of the hierarchs. The okay so close to being given and then it will all be over so fast.

Leon just rented the game from BlockBuster. It is pretty sweet. Graphics aren't too bad. Gameplay goes right along (mostly) with the actual comics and such. Got tired of it pretty quick though. Just not feeling it right now.

Hahwell. Peace whodiesons.

What to do what to do? What would you do? Would you break on down and let them have their way? Or would you remain upright in your decision to...to..to. Systems malfunctioning again. Can't get it up and running. Going to CRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAaaash.

Back inside now. Saw Justin and dad drive by a little while ago. Going home. Wonder if they figure out where I am. Or if Justin just goes to looking for his library card and durkydurrr. I hope he comes up here so I don't have to walk home. That would be bad. Because I am lazy. And that ould make the day suckier than it has already been. Hot motherfucker getting here let me tell you what. Gotta go smoke another stoge in a few. 




Gone like that wind that hits your face on a hot summer day and is gone before you knew it was really there. FFUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUCK.
Have to wait. I have to go smoke a stoge.

Yep. So I have to use the computers here at the Middle(ofnowhere)burg library to get online because I don't have a computer at home and even  if I did I don't have a job to pay for internet service yet. Sooooooo. Every time I get on to check my messages I can't if they have any profanity or stuff like that on there. So if you send me a message it should not have anything in it that the CYBERSITTER may filter out. Haha. I hate this. Lost everything I never really worked for but had nonetheless. I love you Jessica. I am sorry I     ed things up so bad. My wake up call came a little too late and at the expense of the best thing I had so I am not sure that I wanted to live after it. Or even answer the phone for it. 

I wish I could take all the dumb      back, especially lately. But that isn't going to happen. And maybe we should just be good friends so as to not have it hurt so bad anymore. I am such an idiot. Cant figure out the password for this daggum cybersitter. I can't believe it even filters out "bad words". That is so freaking ridiculous. Long walk form my house to this library to deal with not being able to check my mail anyways. It was ninety-six degrees last I checked and it wasn't getting any colder. I hope I get this job with my dad and brother. It would make things much easier for me to deal with. And I don't want to disappoint my dad. It seems weird even to me but I don't think I could stick around much if that happened. I have disappointed so many people so much lately. I hurt all the time nowadays. I can hardly sleep and my mind is slowly taking it's leave of me. Whatever. I am mad and have to stop writing now. Remember, do not use profanity when leaving me a message. Please... And one last thing. If I have wronged you in the past please forgive me my trespasses. I didn't mean to be such a      .

So since last I posted I have had quite a time dealing with myself. Jess and I broke up a number of times. Got back together almost as many. Then I completely lost it last weekend and O.D.ed. Took twenty-seven xannax (did I spell that right? The better question is whether it matters, you get the picture.) And like seventeen or eighteen diladid. Drank a whole bottle of whiskey and then some. Went to the hospital. Died a number of times before coming to a rather rude awakening strapped to a     ing hospital bed with them pulling a tube out of my throat. Didn't know where I was or what I was doing there. No one I knew in sight. Tried to scream when they pulled the tube out. But all I got was a gurgle type noise before collapsing back into unconsciousness. The few parts I do remember are all warped and     ed up. All distorted from the massive amount of drugs I did. I stole some money too. Basically I pulled a Dr.         and Mr. Even more     ed up than that wnen I took my "potions". But I live. Haven't figured out yet if I deserve to or not though. Right? Gotta have broken some kind of record. Lucky as     . My mother told me the other day that I'm not a cat and I don't have nine lives. So I had better quit     ing around and get serious. Heh, kind of sad that it took this long for me to get it, but I did. I quit drinking and doing all that other     . Had to just quit it all. Can't deal with that sort of thing anymore.  

Jess and I are taking a bit of a break. I should guess that she needs it. I     ed a lot of things up real bad of late. Killed myself two or three times. Went to MHRC. Fooled my way out of that         . Moved to Middleburg with my dad and older brother and sisters and stepmom. A lot of ands huh. Almost distasteful writing. Had a few revelations too whilst I was at it. One of which was that after all this time I need to get off of my ass and start doing something for myself. Damn it there was so much more I wanted to add but I haven't been able to get online until now. Sitting at the Middleburg Library with my stepmom. Haha. Who the      knows where it came from though. Just out of nowhere. They have almost the same kind of PC that jess has at her house here. Set up everywhere. But what nots aside and yep.
Stuck here. Forogt to see about a ride home when I got done. So now I am stuck as fuck in Yulee for however long.

Annoyed because I (the queen of the fucking universe am not wanting to deal with that now) I am not the one who wants that now. No trying, no nothinng but, "You are annoying me. And I will exaggerate if I have to to get you to leave me alone."

And I am wrong all the time. 


MEN: DON"T EVER GO AGAINST WHAT THE QUEEN OF THE FUCKING UNIVERSE HAS TO SAY!!! And you should know that apparently the queen of the universe runs shit through all women. BEWAAAAAAAAAAAAARE!!! 



EEEEEEERRRRRRRGGGGGHHHH!!!!

Your Livejournal zombie attack.
LiveJournal Username
The name of your zombie infested home town.
Your zombie killing weapon of choice.
How much do zombies scare you?
Oh noes!!11 A zombie! What do you do?
Blasting zombies left and right with a freaking twelve guage. What do you think?givinguponyou
Curled into a fetal position crying their eyes out.glassdove
Is pwning some zombies with Don't Stop Me Now playing in the background.glassdove
Is sitting at home watching CNN and eating ice cream.fallingglory
Get ripped to pieces by the zombies. Bummer.zwschjrsczski
Is the zombie king who you must destroy to end the zombie menace.priscamor
Number of zombies you decapitate.53
Chances you survive the zombie swarm.
82%
This Fun Quiz created by Rob at BlogQuiz.Net
Pisces Horoscope at DailyHoroscopes.Biz

Sick of it a................ny goddamned way.

a memory.







NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!

That was the best shit I wrote in so fucking long and in some freak mouse accident it is all erased while I am trying to save it. I want to go cry now and think about how big a creep I am. I am sorry everyone?

don't count your beans before they jump. Off the rip I had a feeling about this kid and his conns. And when Paul stepped out and said something about taking care of that for us and someone said to him before he left "nah, we got it handled." I got this sinking feeling that it would be way too late for that shit by the time anyone got around who could.


Fucking people and their bullshit.

And all we have is an insubstantial merry feeling. Better than now. But worse in the whole of the race. But it is my race and I willl fucking run it how I please.

I will post in a few hours. heh.

One of those liquor nights. It storms through, turns the air into pure anger and violence. PLEW. Another reason to? To what? Stomach turns. Coward. What? Why beat yourself up on a daily basis about what you can't help is wrong with your broken brains? Recall on all the grey matter of this particular vintage year. And I missed it and that is why I can't get back to stupid. Because instead of Setting the shit to regression and no defiance to opression I slipped through the cracks. And when everything changes from year to year. ANd they can't remember that it didn't used to be like this. That information is fucking not what I learned two years ago. What the fuck is going on? Things change completely and no one seems to notice. But they say that it is just me. I don't think so. 

Fucking nuts. Not so, not so. Not so much as to not make the most perfect sense. Think about things a little harder. And you would probably always feel alienated.


Arguement in a bottle. Well, we ended up getting beer and shit. A bottle pf crown. 

"We breathe so selfishly." I just feel like I need to get away frome something. It is crushing me. Whether it is me or something foreign I am still not aware. I fell today from the grace I bestowed upon myself. ANd now I am left with something of a husk of former selfportraits and what used to be is now a ghost image. Something holding on long after the physical (and I mean the true physical, not this imitation) self has been gone on to rot. Something that can't quite accept that it is over. But it shouldn't feel that way. It shouldn't feel like everything I used to love is pushing away. Time and space bring about a divide of imeasurable proportions and I can't feel them touching me. Their collective voice holds no warmth for me anymore. But it isn't all bad. I am just over it if that is possible. 

"Something isn't right here,
You've gone and left me on the ground."

EEERRRRR. The most knowledgable person I meet ever (at least about the things that have been in my head since I can remember) and he has to be on his way to losing it completely. 

"And a darker side shall reign for a time. And nothing shall hold meaning for you. And so shalt you continue on your path til the day you find what it is that will make things meaningful again. But for a time you will think dark things and do the deeds of the shadow. For a time." -Dark Priest of the Shadou family. It is from this manga type deal that I am writing/half ass drawing at the moment. Weird it definitely is. I guess.

haha.

MO FO fo sho i know. I know that you aint worth a good goddamn.

Check the new thingie. Heh
I'llhideMother fuck everyone who thinks otherwise. That's right bitch. I AM talking to you.

He doesn't know if he will come back so that doesn't matter. Oh well, these things tend to happen. Feels uncomfortable. Out of place here amongst the people. Wierd in the atmosphere. A conflicting weather pattern in the otherwise flowing regular system of it all? Something like that anyways not uuite like that. I had it mapped out in my head and when it came out as usual: CRAPPED IT OUT ONTO THE PAPER. Value of thought is deprciated by the words you try to use to describe it. That is why we need to find a way to link our thought. Some type of mechanical mind meld. Mechanical magic. Scientific approach to telekinesis and stuff like what people think as myth? I think it is pretty intriguing. May not seem quite as mystical as other approaches, but hey, who the fuck's complaining? 

I got some doctor bills in just the other day. Guess how much? Somewhere around about an infinite amount of something I couldn't hope to pay for in like ten years at the rate I am moving through this time and space. Well, right now I only have my bill. Which for them to treat me and make sure I was okay after the accident I had to pay them eleven thousand-three hundred and thirty two dollars. And I wasn't even in overnight. The guy who was with me is still in there. And he has been for at least two weeks. Wonder what that super uber mega fucking bill is going to run me? 

If I could ever get the scanner to work I would start posting some of the shit I have been working on. And if I could ever get enough energy and inspiration up to do more. I guess that is just all that is lacking, the energy or drive to do anything. But, uh yeah...nevermind that what I was going to say. It was probably bullshit like usual. Feeling hopefull for a moment and then all of a sudden I am going to...yeah whatever.

So I have been thinking about this for a long time now. You know, the whole going into business for myself thing. And I have been talking to Distilledpoison about this. And as soon as I can get a loan of some sort (which should be pretty soon if what I am trying to do comes through) we can start this shit up. We have been thinking and we decided that it would be sweet to start a small independant studio for a lot of things. I am not going into too much detail here and now, but I may fairly soon. If you are interested in anime and other forms of art and stuff like manga though, you should leave me a message and let me know. I am going to need a lot of help and hopefully I will have about fifty to a hundred thousand dollars to work with. We will know after the twenty fourth whether we get the loan or not, but that is subject to change. Anyone that knows anything about... ummmmmm, shit if you think you know something that would help start something like what I am trying to do you should leave me a message or something. I know I should elaborate and all, but right now I am tired and have an interview today at eight thirty and still don't know how the fuck I am going to get there. Let's just leave it at this. If you know anything about web page design or video game design you should say something. If you are interested. If anyone even reads this shit.

So there was a wedding yesterday. In brunswick georgia. Friend of mine (Andy) married my grandma'a husband's daughter (Tina). Guess who wasn't there for that shit? Whatever. Don't know what i am doing today, but i guess it won't really matter. Second halloween in a row free. Sweet. Gonna get high at least. got something for that definitely and i don't have to rely on anyone else for that. Could just go off somewhere by myself and get stoned. With Jess of course. But by ourselves like that one Valentine's day when i brought over the weed and we just got stoned and agreed that it really was a good V-day. The first good one. That holiday is so fucking gay. Ridiculous is what it is. So yeah. Jess is in the shower and i am bored as shit. Think I'll cal BigNiggahD and get him to bring his bowl so we can smoke. Other than that there isn't shit going on. I talked to my brother and he is bored as shit too, in Middleburg though, not here in J-ville where there is always something to be bored at. I haven't done anything in a while as far as uhhhhhhh...

Forgot where i was going with that. Chilled with Donnie and Kris for a while the other night. AThat was sweet as shit. Haven't seen Kris in a long little while so it was a treat. I am seriously the most boring person ever I think. The worst. FUCK. SHIT. ASS. BITCH. 

I have been thinking lately. I don't ever go to the doctor for checkups or anything for that matter. Wonder how unhealthy I am. Wonder how long I have before I die. Probably not that long from now. So my girlfriend's mom hates me and only puts up with me because her daughter makes it so. And I don't particularly like her too much right now either, so we are sort of even. Except for the fact that i suck and can't take care of myself apparently. So I live here, don't have a job, don't own shit of my own, and I just continue to drag this pathetic charade on and on. My dad keeps telling me to come home and let him find me a job and he wil take care of it if I just come home and admit defeat. 

And to an extent I have been thinking about it. What if he is right? What if I should have just stayed home when I got out last time? What if when it all comes down to it I can't hack it? Can't take the stress of living? But I just don't see this happening to me. I have always been alright. I always pull through if just barely. So it is whatever like I said before. 



And for those of you that think me to be immature or whatever flaw you find in my writing... Well, what have we here in this bag of goodies? huh, what have we got for you guys? Not much of anything at all except this apology for not being perfedt for you guys who are. You know the guys I am talking about. Fuck it. I have come to a revelation just now and it is none of you fuckers can tell me a goddamn thing. I really don't give one good fuck that you think the way that i write makes no sense. If it makes no sense to you, don't read it. If you think it is garbage then read some other shit that isn't garbage to you. Save your petty insults for someone who gives a good goddamn or two. 





Oh yeah, happy halloween.
fucketty fuck shit fuck your mom and her little dog too.

what the fuck was that?

i left the trailer for that shit?

what a fucking jip. but whatever. da da da da   da da  da da da da  da da.


nothing to say.

more more mroe icons goddamnit. not enough.

hey, watch the flood god is sending. It is supposed to take place at roughly 1.30 or so. 
but yeah. i bought these dice that are bronze with rhinestone as the numbered dots. they are the sweetest.

she just had a minute dream that we were smoking a joint and it came undone. 

Like the world on that day. The day they snatched it all away. but i told her that it could be rolled again even better this time. like the life i am trying to ravel back together. So it's all good.

piece by piece. Strand by strand, it comes back to me. While i sleep i figure out these oh so complex secrets of the universe. and forgotten before the sleep is clear if the eyes i retun to normality.

one big pathetic mess. that is what we have become. A giant boil on the face of the earth. Pulsing, rotting away at the very structure of health. sucking the world dry. 

Didn't you corporate fucks ever wahtc Captain Planet when you were a little kid. 

"Looting and Polluting is not the way."

get a fucking clue, you...you, you...

i don't know. i don't have a classification low enough for those of you that lie to the people for some personal gain or other. that cheat your way to the top and continue to cheat. And sacrifice the wellbeing of others to get ahead. it doesn't matter that the man you laid the fuck off is at home barely getting by. Doesn't know what to do with himself now. Doesn't have the monetary equivalent of life so to speak. or at least the necesarry funds to live on is just beyond his reach. and as he struggles to get it, it's oh so very close. If he'd just work a little harder; you know, those extra nights he puts in for you off the clock; tries his damndestto get that one promotion so he can up his living expenses. But all that really goes on is this man puts his very self into this work for you vying with other employees for your special approval. And you exploit that shit to the fullest. "HMPH! Just good business sense." you say. 

well you can eat a mean one.

right right. I'm not exactly sure as to what the Fuck I am talking about. DassMeeee. Bathroom fun. DassMeeAgain. right right. Anyways. So i was like ten dollars under today and had to get back up. Had to borrow it from jess' mom. Her mom got me a job and shit. At Grinders or whatever. Washing dishes. Honest living (if you could call what i was doing living of course). not sure what has been going on but i am not making the money that i was. gotta tighten down. work harder play less.
today is dragging by. it sucks. don't have anything inparticular that i want to write about.

Some pics from the warped tour? Dude Flogging Molly rocks muh sox. Muh Baby Boo aftah da show was done. It was just so fuckin nasty in there that i couldn't go without getting at least one pic of it. FUCKING WAR ZONE. Fuckin super D duper slipnslide. waiting to get the usb for jess' camera so we can post the pic of me her and James. got to dance with him again. this time to International Noise Conspiracy. they were so fucking amazing. More Flogging Molly. Awesome I says, awesome. you know i can't let this one not be in the lj. Dude brought his own backpack of spray paint just to do dat shit. URBAN FUCKING ART I am your god. bow down and worship my tiny penis since you're already down there. After the show. Notice BigNiggahD's broke ass glasses. he got dat shit so mutha fuckin crunk it aint even funny. you should've seen Jess in the pit dude. She took that shit over. almost plowed right over me. well, that is it for now.

come out on top no matter what. 
Always gonna be okay.
never goin under.
never have to quit.
just egress.

what is the fifth dimension of your being? because if i knew that shit, oh boy, think of where i would be. Not the whole three dimensional outdated last years version of existence, that's for godamned sure.

"we'll have you dead pretty soon."



end transmission.

well. Ten minutes into the modifying of my journal. Jess and I somehow happened to completely screwwwwwwwwwwwww the boy's lj. Le__garcon. i can't even pull it up to see my entries. fuck. fuck. fuck.fuck. i am an idiot. i get mad over nothing. but i could be there. right there where I should be. but yeah. i come closer and closer to saying fuck a job. fuck money. I have to leave. I can't stay here anymore. it eats away until there is nothingleft to eat. Until one is just a husk of his former being. I am so unhappy. Even though i am happier than i have ever been. i can't be happy. not completely. not ever. i want to leave.

Well. Not sure if she meant me or not. But I changed the user pic for a little while so no one would be confused. Now it is of me. I was thinkin she thought maybe it was jess' journal. 

but if not then thank you again.

I am so fucking Bored. I am Sofa King Board. This is pitiful. The stand alone complex. Some more pics? "Big booty bitches" "just some shit. Thanks be to Photoshop" whatnot. whatnot. feel like a zombie sometimes. Walking about not dead, but not quite alive. Spreading my disease until my body slowly rots away. Nothing short of utter annihilation. Nothing better than the pain we feel from the emptiness in our hearts. it hurts down to the pit of our guts. We bleed from our ears. Every drop payment to the screams. The agony of selfdefeat. Giving up too soon. On myself, on my mom, on all that i try to care for but fail. And each time i lay in bed and cry for my lost soul to come home. I just cry. Because "nothing can hurt you in the dark". Unless you're three years old and he's in one of those moods again. Does he make you call him daddy? Does he like it when you fight back? Does he come back for more until he breaks you. Snaps you in two, right the fuck in half. But you pretend that nothing is wrong and everytime they ask you want to scream again right in their fuckass faces. But ah ah ahhhh. Tisk tisk. Let's not forget the ringing in your ears. and the blood on your shoulders. And the pain in your head.

So how about that shit? Finally got some user pics of me and some other people. Jessica and me in one. Tony and his NattyIce in another. And Jess in the other.

Gotta find jess a ride home from work now. I'll be back.

jess left me with a housefull and wrote me off as not going with her and el. I know they wanted some time alone or something. but ellie was talking about someone coming to pick jess up and that they might want to chill too. And I was still like "naw, it's cool. You guys need some time to talk "alone" bout some shit. Which is what i figure they wanted to do. But it's cool for ellie to have somone along. 

But whatever. If she comes home and talks about hanging out with people other than el, think I'm just going to leave. "She just needed a 'girls night out'" I guess. Gotta go get some glue. Mom wont answer the phone. Everyone left a little while after jess and ellie took off. So now I sit at this console and type. I have sicerely been thinking about moving of late. I mean a lot. Like I dream of it. I think about somewhere new constantly. If Jess would agree I would so pick up and leave so fast.

But these are the times that I see what bouncing a child from home to home can do to his life. No friends. The family I have I don't know about. Don't know if they except me. Since I got out of jail I've neglected to make any new friends. You know how that goes. You get locked up. For the first few months everyone sends you lots of pics and letters about how much they love you. How much they wish they could see you. Then, as the months progress, the letters become few and far between. Even from your beloved, who you think will write you as much as possible. Then you start to develop these feelings like "hey, I guess they moved on. Guess they found something better. Something real. Something there in front of them. Tangible. Soft and warm. And all the while you are lying in your bunk in the concrete/stainless steel cage appointed you by the state of WHATTHEFUCKEVER and cry yourself to sleep. So cold. So utterly defeated. Longing for a good dream. Or at least a night of black thick sleep to engulf your soul. The sleep you do manage to aquire is riddled with bad dreams. Wishing to touch her face. Just once, if even through four inches of tempered, steel laced glass. 

And you are left behind as your life just simply goes away. You get bitter and resent them. You break up with the love of your life. And by the end of that third year you step out of those gates for the first and the last time. You get your beloved back. But it isn't the same. You aren't the same. And you only just begin to realize how fucked up in the head you are. And how fucked up everything is. And you're nineteen
with no experience. No real memories because you're life is so mixed up that you can't remember things as they happened. you lost three years of your life. Your memories are in shambles. You despise your mother for helping them to put you in that cage for so long. 

And the stress. It becomes too much. It gets to the point where you just can't deal with things. You snap at the first sign of trouble no matter how calm you attempt to stay. Alone and thinking of things you thought you were past. But you know that you'll never be past these haunted nightmares. Things like the scars on your arms. And how easy it would be to begin anew. To collect your thoughts through the beading red lifeforce running intricately down your arm. You know you will find forgiveness there. Some sort of grounding for the head that is in space instead of where it should be. On your fucking shoulders. 

::he looks up and sees the knife on the table just over the keyboard and decides to keep his fingers on the keys. lest he fail you. Lest he let you down again. 

A desperate attempt to live. A clinging to this hell. The fear. She told me that if I yelled at her like that again she was going to leave me. Find someone else who would not scream at her.

She is right though. She deserves so much better than what i could ever give. I don't think I am going to make it very far in life and that is fine if I ever seperate from this relationship. But I don't foresee that happening unless she decides to end it. I screamed that it was over right in her face today. Think I broke my wrist right before that. We were arguing and I kicked the door after she slammed it in my face. Then I walked in and she slammed OUR door in my face (door to our bedroom). I hit it with my hurt wrist a few times and now I think it is broken in some fashion or other. She yelled at me to "GET THE FUCK OUT OF MY HOUSE!"

So before I left, I screamed that it was over and left. But as usual, we came to the conclusion that I was completely wrong and this was all my fault. And I came back and apologized for how fucked up I am. Now I an sitting here thinking about doing some stuff I haven't done in a long time. And it would hurt her. And she would be so disappointed in me. And it would be so selfish of me to cut my arms. To let my pain leak to the surface and wash away.

Can't fake. 
Not with this.
Not for that.
Not for anything.
Not anymore.
Not after what has happened.

Can't pretend there's nothing wrong.
Something's terribly amiss.
see it all around me.
Everything falling down.
The fire in my eyes
comes from the searing pain
they've left me with.

So i sit.
with this overwhelming knowledge.
knowing how it will end.
for me.
for you.
for everyone else...

and as those white hot shards of glass
begin to circulate through my body once more,
rending, Burning, blinding, 
a single tear falls.
and my well runs dry.

Apathy.
then atrophy.
then my mind will waste away.
i will pine for you

and the world will die alone.
in a sudden flash fire 
from within this little man.
